sect2.title: Configuring Shadow
sect2.para: This package contains utilities to add, modify and delete users and groups, set and change their passwords, and other such administrative tasks. For a full explanation of what password shadowing means, see the doc/HOWTO file within the unpacked source tree. There's one thing to keep in mind if you decide to use Shadow support: programs that need to verify passwords (display managers, ftp programs, pop3 daemons, and the like) need to be shadow-compliant, that is they need to be able to work with shadowed passwords.
